CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

after an initial slip-up on the word hungry in the title , Chi is a good reader; Mot prompts by focussing Chi's attention on certain sounds , or just gives word that Chi has read wrong; after Saturday foods Mot says to slow down and seems to want to comment on the book; but Chi is concentrating pretty hard on the reading and doesn't make extra observations , though the context notes indicate that she is following the story

u.a: sitting on couch in living room , Chi holds book Mot watches--close
Chi turns page , not sure where to read , MOT points
Chi begins to smile at story
points , follows rest of line with her finger until good
difficult passage Chi gets really serious , lots_of concentration
